alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 26 at 9:13PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Florida... Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... For the Little Manatee...including Wimauma at US 301...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Flooding of several houses begins near 32nd and 33rd streets in Ruskin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 15.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.0 feet on 07/25/1945. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Little Manatee River Wimauma at US 301 11.0 6.9 Mon 8 pm 10.6 14.2 15.0 14.0 11.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1215 PM EDT.
